comment: The <marker> element defines the graphic that is to be used for drawing arrowheads or polymarkers on a given <path>, <line>, <polyline> or <polygon> element.

attributes.name: refX
attributes.comment: x of the reference point of the marker.

attributes.name: refY
attributes.comment: y of the reference point of the marker.

attributes.name: orient
attributes.comment: the orientation of the marker relative to the shape it is attached to. eg: 'auto', 'auto-start-reverse', '65deg'.

attributes.name: preserveAspectRatio
attributes.comment: how the svg fragment must be deformed if it is embedded in a container with a different aspect ratio. eg: (none| xMinYMin| xMidYMin| xMaxYMin| xMinYMid| xMidYMid| xMaxYMid| xMinYMax| xMidYMax| xMaxYMax) (meet|slice)

attributes.name: viewBox
attributes.comment: the bound of the SVG viewport for the current SVG fragment. eg: '0 0 100 100'
